params._dripRate: Numer of tokens per block to drip

drip().details: Note: this will only drip up to the amount of tokens available.
drip().return: The amount of tokens dripped in this call

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingDrip(address).return: The amount of tokens can be dripped for a distributor

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

add(uint256,address).notice: Add a new distributor to the pool. Can only be called by the owner

drip().notice: Drips the maximum amount of tokens to match the drip rate since inception

pendingDrip(address).notice: Check how much can be dripped for a distributor

set(uint256,address).notice: Update the given distributor's LODs allocation point. Can only be called by the owner.

updateAll().notice: update reward variables for all distributors.
